author: Greg Mency
comment: One problem, battery level still has not been working since first install
title: Lovely face

author: Jonathan Ross
comment: Looks realistic, which is a big plus. However, can't choose what's shown on the inner dials. (Also, phone power dial constantly at 0, LG watch R paired with Nexus 6, M)
title: Pretty good

author: Donny Rogers
comment: My LG G Watch R ambient mode is a little to bright and washes out pretty much any watch face but yours still looks pretty nice!
title: Looks great.

author: Will Arnold
comment: Hope this gets a read by the developer, looked great on my LG G watch R, however now I have the LG Urbane in silver and it doesn't look quite right. Add the option for silver hands and numbers then it is perfect!
title: Great but colour change option?

author: Grayson Carr
comment: But 6 is cut off on Moto 360. On the 360, it would look better if the 6 just wasn't there.
title: Good

author: Bruce Williams
comment: I really like the face. Looks like on my LG Watch R. Please fix the setting so it accessible via the android wear app instead of having the setting in the apps list.
title: Nice face

author: Katherine Sepulveda
comment: I can't see the watch in the wear app so can't get it on my watch
title: Won't load

author: Lourdes Rodriguez
comment: My favorite watch face by far. Lg watch urbane. Works flawlessly and uses very little battery. Love that I can choose my ambient mode. Thanks 😊
title: My go-to watch face

author: Rasmus Breymas
comment: Lovely watchface but the 6 being cut off doesn't look nice... Please fix it! Using the MOTO360 btw.
title: Remove the 6!
